Articles.Content:
Hey Guys! I decided to show all of you something I'm working on right now.

It's quite unfinished for now as I have to model the rest of the scene, so I didn't work on the details.

Taking a second look, it feels quite empty and desaturated. No concrete textures...no grass...no contrast...for now!

here you go:

Plus a timelapse video for anyone wondering how it was made. Don't mind the music, it was easily the hardest part to edit. I hope you have 30min to spare!

I decided to not record the rest of the work as it takes quite some time to edit.

Using blender 2.72 + photoshop + KSP

Really interesting.

It's of my concern what will be done with this, so I am looking forward to it
